assessments.status_rationale: Coverage mentions Canada’s latest tussle with U.S. tariffs but shows no clear announcement and implementation of Canadian retaliatory surtaxes.

No report of the ISM Manufacturing Prices Index for October 2025 is in today’s news, and the release typically occurs after the stated deadline.
Articles note cooler inflation sentiment but provide no confirmation the 2-year yield closed at or below 4.40%. The window remains open.
No settlement level for front-month RBOB at or below $2.10 is reported in today’s coverage.
There is no mention of Fluor announcing a strategic review or monetization plan for its NuScale stake.
No OFAC action designating a China-based entity under Russia-related programs is reported.
No evidence that the 10-year TIPS breakeven closed at or below 2.20% appears in today’s news.
No USD/CAD price action to 1.3800 or higher is cited.
The comparison period is still underway and today’s reporting does not provide definitive relative performance for IWM vs. SPY.
